structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Property Valued In Excess Of Three Hundred Dollars; Notice Of Sale
law.text: If the value of such property to be sold exceeds three hundred dollars, the officer shall, at the request of either party, give notice of the sale by advertisement in a newspaper as provided in the preceding section; and the sale may be made at any time after the expiration of four days, and within thirty days after seizure on execution.
